game.name: Memories of a Vagabond
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Trading Cards, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: You play as a young mercenary and travel from soul to soul to avenge your fiance and her family. While finding a way to change the flow of past events, you will encounter many obstacles and meet new allies. Will you be brave enough?
